about_the_game:
2nd of 4 brand new item packs adding weapons and armor that may or may not be totally OP to your game.

A whole new quest line!

Get these not-so-exclusive San Diego Exclusives! You don't need to be at Comic-Con to get them! Just at a computer! And with a debit/credit card! You still need money. You'll need that. Unfortunately, money IS exclusive to buying things.

Simply go to the Sports Complex at Miskatonic University and look for anything.... strange. Are these just wacky faculty and students of a haunted university that are celebrating their lineage... or is something else going on?

Can this description use any more commas?

...

ITEMS:
- ASCOT OF THE AMERICAN HERO
- HOMEMADE DUSTIN STARCORE COSPLAY
- NARWOWLBEAR COSPLAY
